Alertness.name: Alertness
Alertness.description: You gain a +2 bonus on Listen and Spot checks.
Alertness.benefits: +2 bonus on Listen and Spot checks.

Ambidexterity.name: Ambidexterity
Ambidexterity.description: You can fight with either hand without penalty.
Ambidexterity.benefits: You suffer no penalties when fighting with your off-hand.

Armor Proficiency (Light).name: Armor Proficiency (Light)
Armor Proficiency (Light).description: You are proficient with light armor and suffer no penalties for wearing it.

Armor Proficiency (Medium).name: Armor Proficiency (Medium)
Armor Proficiency (Medium).description: You are proficient with medium armor and suffer no penalties for wearing it.

Armor Proficiency (Heavy).name: Armor Proficiency (Heavy)
Armor Proficiency (Heavy).description: You are proficient with heavy armor and suffer no penalties for wearing it.

Blind-Fight.name: Blind-Fight
Blind-Fight.description: You fight with a heightened awareness of your surroundings, even if you cannot see your enemy.
Blind-Fight.benefits: You ignore concealment and get a +2 bonus on opposed Acrobatics checks to move in melee.

Combat Casting.name: Combat Casting
Combat Casting.description: You are trained to cast spells while on the defensive.
Combat Casting.benefits: +4 bonus on Concentration checks made to cast a spell or use a spell-like ability when casting defensively or while grappled.

Combat Reflexes.name: Combat Reflexes
Combat Reflexes.description: You can react quickly to threats and make additional attacks of opportunity.
Combat Reflexes.benefits: You may make a number of additional attacks of opportunity per round equal to your Dexterity bonus.

Dodge.name: Dodge
Dodge.description: You are skilled at avoiding attacks.
Dodge.benefits: +1 dodge bonus to AC against attacks from a designated opponent.

Mobility.name: Mobility
Mobility.description: You are skilled at moving through threatened areas without provoking attacks of opportunity.
Mobility.benefits: +4 dodge bonus to AC against attacks of opportunity caused when you move out of or within a threatened area.

Spring Attack.name: Spring Attack
Spring Attack.description: You can move both before and after making a melee attack.
Spring Attack.prerequisites: Dex 13+, Dodge, Mobility, Base attack bonus +4 or higher
Spring Attack.benefits: You can move up to your speed, make a single melee attack, and then continue moving without provoking attacks of opportunity.

Endurance.name: Endurance
Endurance.benefits: +4 bonus on checks related to forced marches, heat or cold exposure, starvation, and thirst.

Exotic Weapon Proficiency.name: Exotic Weapon Proficiency
Exotic Weapon Proficiency.description: You are proficient with an exotic weapon of your choice.
Exotic Weapon Proficiency.benefits: Proficient with a chosen exotic weapon.
Exotic Weapon Proficiency.special: Can be taken multiple times for different weapons.

Expertise.name: Expertise
Expertise.description: You gain specialized training in a weapon, improving your combat skills with it.
Expertise.benefits: Choose one weapon; you get a +1 bonus on attack and damage rolls with it.
Expertise.special: Can be taken multiple times for different weapons.

Improved Disarm.name: Improved Disarm
Improved Disarm.description: You do not provoke an attack of opportunity when attempting to disarm an opponent.
Improved Disarm.benefits: No attack of opportunity when disarming; +2 bonus on disarm checks.

Improved Trip.name: Improved Trip
Improved Trip.description: You do not provoke an attack of opportunity when attempting to trip an opponent.
Improved Trip.benefits: No attack of opportunity when tripping; +2 bonus on trip checks.

Whirlwind Attack.name: Whirlwind Attack
Whirlwind Attack.description: You can make a full attack against all opponents within reach.
Whirlwind Attack.prerequisites: Int 13+, Expertise, Dex 13+, Dodge, Mobility, Base attack bonus +4 or higher, Spring Attack
Whirlwind Attack.benefits: You can make a melee attack against each opponent within reach as a full-round action.

Great Fortitude.name: Great Fortitude
Great Fortitude.description: You have exceptional stamina and health.

Improved Critical.name: Improved Critical
Improved Critical.description: You can deal critical hits more easily with a chosen weapon.
Improved Critical.prerequisites: Proficient with weapon, Base attack bonus +8 or higher
Improved Critical.benefits: Double the threat range of a chosen weapon.
Improved Critical.special: Can be taken multiple times for different weapons.

Improved Initiative.name: Improved Initiative
Improved Initiative.description: You are quick to act in combat.

Improved Unarmed Strike.name: Improved Unarmed Strike
Improved Unarmed Strike.description: You are skilled at fighting without weapons.
Improved Unarmed Strike.benefits: No longer provoke attacks of opportunity when striking unarmed; damage equals 1d6 for medium creatures.

Deflect Arrows.name: Deflect Arrows
Deflect Arrows.description: You can deflect missiles with your hands.
Deflect Arrows.benefits: Once per round, you can deflect an arrow or similar ranged attack.

Stunning Fist.name: Stunning Fist
Stunning Fist.description: You can stun opponents with a precise unarmed strike.
Stunning Fist.prerequisites: Dex 13+, Improved Unarmed Strike, Wis 13+, Base attack bonus +8 or higher
Stunning Fist.benefits: Use a stunning attack that may render the opponent stunned for 1 round.

Iron Will.name: Iron Will
Iron Will.description: You have a strong mind and spirit.

Leadership.name: Leadership
Leadership.description: You attract loyal followers and a cohort.
Leadership.benefits: Gain a cohort and followers, based on your Leadership score.

Lightning Reflexes.name: Lightning Reflexes
Lightning Reflexes.description: You are quick to dodge attacks.

Martial Weapon Proficiency.name: Martial Weapon Proficiency
Martial Weapon Proficiency.description: You are proficient with all martial weapons.

Mounted Combat.name: Mounted Combat
Mounted Combat.description: You are skilled at fighting from horseback.
Mounted Combat.benefits: +4 bonus on Ride checks to avoid attacks of opportunity when mounted.

Mounted Archery.name: Mounted Archery
Mounted Archery.description: You can shoot ranged weapons from horseback.
Mounted Archery.benefits: No penalty on ranged attacks while mounted.

Trample.name: Trample
Trample.description: You can trample opponents while mounted.
Trample.benefits: Charge attack that can trample enemies.

Ride-By Attack.name: Ride-By Attack
Ride-By Attack.description: You can move before and after making a mounted melee attack.
Ride-By Attack.benefits: Move, attack, and continue moving without provoking attacks of opportunity.

Spirited Charge.name: Spirited Charge
Spirited Charge.description: You gain double damage on mounted charge attacks.
Spirited Charge.prerequisites: Ride skill, Mounted Combat, Ride-By Attack
Spirited Charge.benefits: Double damage on mounted charge attacks.

Point Blank Shot.name: Point Blank Shot
Point Blank Shot.description: You are skilled at shooting ranged weapons at close range.
Point Blank Shot.benefits: +1 bonus on attack and damage rolls with ranged weapons at ranges of 30 feet or less.

Far Shot.name: Far Shot
Far Shot.description: You can shoot ranged weapons at longer distances without penalties.

Precise Shot.name: Precise Shot
Precise Shot.description: You can shoot ranged weapons without penalty even when your target is engaged in melee.
Precise Shot.benefits: No -4 penalty on ranged attacks against targets engaged in melee.

Rapid Shot.name: Rapid Shot
Rapid Shot.description: You can make an additional ranged attack each round.
Rapid Shot.benefits: You can make one extra ranged attack per round at your highest attack bonus.

Shot on the Run.name: Shot on the Run
Shot on the Run.description: You can move and shoot during the same round.
Shot on the Run.prerequisites: Point Blank Shot, Dex 13+, Dodge, Mobility
Shot on the Run.benefits: Move up to your speed, make a single ranged attack, and continue moving without provoking attacks of opportunity.

Power Attack.name: Power Attack
Power Attack.description: You can make powerful melee attacks at the cost of accuracy.
Power Attack.benefits: Subtract a chosen amount from your attack rolls and add it to your damage rolls.

Cleave.name: Cleave
Cleave.description: You can strike two adjacent foes after a successful attack.
Cleave.benefits: Make an additional melee attack against an adjacent opponent if your first attack drops a foe.

Improved Bull Rush.name: Improved Bull Rush
Improved Bull Rush.description: You do not provoke attacks of opportunity when performing a bull rush.
Improved Bull Rush.benefits: No attack of opportunity when bull rushing; +2 bonus on bull rush checks.

Sunder.name: Sunder
Sunder.description: You can attack and damage an opponent's weapon or shield.

Great Cleave.name: Great Cleave
Great Cleave.description: You can continue to make cleave attacks as long as you keep dropping foes.
Great Cleave.prerequisites: Str 13+, Power Attack, Cleave, Base attack bonus +4 or higher
Great Cleave.benefits: After a successful cleave, you can make another cleave attack.

Quick Draw.name: Quick Draw
Quick Draw.description: You can draw weapons as a free action.
Quick Draw.benefits: Draw weapons or items as a free action.

Run.name: Run
Run.description: You can run at four times your normal speed.
Run.benefits: Run at four times your normal speed instead of three.

Simple Weapon Proficiency.name: Simple Weapon Proficiency
Simple Weapon Proficiency.description: You are proficient with simple weapons.

Skill Focus.name: Skill Focus
Skill Focus.description: You gain a +3 bonus on a chosen skill.
Skill Focus.special: Can be taken multiple times for different skills.

Spell Focus.name: Spell Focus
Spell Focus.description: You gain a +1 bonus to the save DC of spells from a chosen school of magic.
Spell Focus.benefits: +1 bonus to save DCs of spells from chosen school.
Spell Focus.special: Can be taken multiple times for different schools.

Spell Penetration.name: Spell Penetration
Spell Penetration.description: You can overcome spell resistance more easily.
Spell Penetration.benefits: +2 bonus on caster level checks to overcome spell resistance.

Toughness.name: Toughness
Toughness.description: You have enhanced stamina and vitality.
Toughness.benefits: Gain 3 hit points when taken; additional hit points for every 3 levels beyond 3rd.
Toughness.special: Can be taken multiple times; effects stack.

Track.name: Track
Track.description: You can follow tracks and signs to find creatures.
Track.benefits: +2 bonus on Survival checks to follow tracks.

Two-Weapon Fighting.name: Two-Weapon Fighting
Two-Weapon Fighting.description: You can fight with a weapon in each hand.
Two-Weapon Fighting.benefits: -6 penalty on primary hand attacks and -10 on off-hand attacks (penalties reduced with Improved Two-Weapon Fighting).

Improved Two-Weapon Fighting.name: Improved Two-Weapon Fighting
Improved Two-Weapon Fighting.description: You gain an additional attack with your off-hand.
Improved Two-Weapon Fighting.prerequisites: Two-Weapon Fighting, Ambidexterity, Base attack bonus +9 or higher

Weapon Finesse.name: Weapon Finesse
Weapon Finesse.description: Use Dexterity instead of Strength on attack rolls with light weapons.
Weapon Finesse.prerequisites: Proficient with weapon, Base attack bonus +1 or higher
Weapon Finesse.benefits: Use Dexterity instead of Strength for attack rolls with certain weapons.
Weapon Finesse.special: Can be taken multiple times for different weapons.

Weapon Focus.name: Weapon Focus
Weapon Focus.description: You gain a +1 bonus on attack rolls with a chosen weapon.
Weapon Focus.prerequisites: Proficient with weapon, Base attack bonus +1 or higher
Weapon Focus.benefits: +1 bonus on attack rolls with chosen weapon.
Weapon Focus.special: Can be taken multiple times for different weapons.

Brew Potion.name: Brew Potion
Brew Potion.benefits: Create potions of spells you know.

Craft Magic Arms and Armor.name: Craft Magic Arms and Armor
Craft Magic Arms and Armor.description: You can create magic weapons and armor.

Craft Wondrous Item.name: Craft Wondrous Item
Craft Wondrous Item.description: You can create various magic items.

Enlarge Spell.name: Enlarge Spell
Enlarge Spell.description: Increase the range of a spell by 50%.

Extend Spell.name: Extend Spell
Extend Spell.description: Double the duration of a spell.

Heighten Spell.name: Heighten Spell
Heighten Spell.description: Increase the effective level of a spell.
Heighten Spell.benefits: Increase save DC as if spell was higher level.

Maximize Spell.name: Maximize Spell
Maximize Spell.description: Maximize all variable numeric effects of a spell.

Quicken Spell.name: Quicken Spell
Quicken Spell.description: Cast a spell as a free action.

Extra Turning.name: Extra Turning
Extra Turning.description: You can turn or rebuke undead more times per day.
Extra Turning.benefits: Gain extra turn/rebuke undead attempts per day.

Spell Mastery.name: Spell Mastery
Spell Mastery.description: You can prepare and cast spells without a spellbook.
Spell Mastery.benefits: Prepare and cast certain spells without a spellbook.

Weapon Specialization.name: Weapon Specialization
Weapon Specialization.description: You gain a +2 bonus on damage rolls with a chosen weapon.
Weapon Specialization.benefits: +2 bonus on damage rolls with chosen weapon.
Weapon Specialization.special: Can be taken multiple times for different weapons. See pg 37
